levelList.name: Cascading Despair
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has 4+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1
[WinDuel] Inflict [ColdBlackTear] equal to the # of remaining Coins

levelList.name: Sharp Teardrops
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has 4+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] If target has 20 or higher SP, Base Power +1
[WinDuel] Inflict [ColdBlackTear] equal to the # of remaining Coins

levelList.name: River of Despairing Tears
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 4 [Sinking] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] If target has 1+ [ColdBlackTear], Coin Power +1
[DefeatDuel] Deal -80% damage and damage dealt by this Skill cannot Stagger the target

levelList.name: Shared Sorrow, Dulled
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] Inflict 1 [ColdBlackTear]

levelList.name: Violent Cascade of Hollow Despair
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with the most [ColdBlackTear]
[WhenUse] If the main target has 5+ [ColdBlackTear], Coin Power +5

coindescs.desc: [UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Deal fixed damage equal to ([ColdBlackTear] Stack on target x 6)% of target's max HP, then remove all [ColdBlackTear] on target

levelList.name: Arcana: Tear and Pierce
levelList.desc:
Uses this Skill when an enemy uses Arcana[TabExplain] Slave, and when this unit does not have [CollapsedPride]
Counterattacks only Arcana Slave

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Deal fixed damage equal to ([ColdBlackTear] Stack on target x 6)% of target's max HP, then remove all [ColdBlackTear] on target (ignores Resistances)

levelList.name: Faded Faith
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 4 [Sinking] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] If target has 10 or higher SP, Base Power +1
[WhenUse] If target has 20 or higher SP, Coin Power +1

levelList.name: Weathered Pride
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 4 [Sinking] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] If target has 10 or higher SP, Base Power +1
[WhenUse] If target has 20 or higher SP, Coin Power +1

levelList.name: Endless Despair
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 4 [Sinking] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] If target has 10 or higher SP, Base Power +1
[WhenUse] If target has 20 or higher SP, Coin Power +1

levelList.name: Sword Sharpened with Tears
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Coin Power +5 for every 6 [Sinking] on target (max 10)
[WhenUse] If target has [ColdBlackTear], Final Power +1

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If target has 6+ [Sinking], inflict ([Sinking] on target / 10) [DefenseDown] next turn (rounded down)

levelList.name: Sword Laced with Grief
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Coin Power +3 for every 6 [Sinking] on target (max 6)
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every [ColdBlackTear] Count on target (max 3)

coindescs.desc:
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Deal bonus Gloom damage equal to (Skill Power)% of target's max HP (max 30)
- If target has 2+ [ColdBlackTear], deal bonus Gloom damage again
